forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 37, with temperatures rising to around 39 overnight. East northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 63. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. Southwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 71. West southwest wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 24, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 9am, then a chance of freezing rain between 9am and 11am, then rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 38. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. East wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms before 7am, then freezing rain and showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 32. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 23, with temperatures rising to around 27 overnight. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 8am, then a chance of freezing rain between 8am and 10am, then rain showers between 10am and 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 40 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 35 overnight. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 8am, then freezing rain and rain and a chance of thunderstorms between 8am and 5pm, then freezing rain and rain and sleet likely. Cloudy, with a high near 34. East wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed on Tuesday morning. Conditions are very good. The upper trails have the best conditions.
nubsNob.comments: We are being blessed with another beautiful ski day in late March. The sun is out and the snow is in great shape. Expect a firmer snow in the morning that will soften up by mid-day. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
